application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details pursuant to Conditions 2.4 of Planning Permission F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014 for the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area to make amendments to the approved Revised Development Specification Framework including amendments to the Zonal Floorspace Schedule (Appendix 5 of the Revised Development Specification Framework) Table 1 (Development Floorspace) and Table 6 Floorspace Thresholds for Building Zones (included within Parameter Plan 014 of the Revised Development Specification Framework). Amendments relate to the introduction of Large Scale Purpose Built Shared Living as a non C3 Residential Use, addition of a note to clarify the approach to cycle store floorspace and an amendment to the Zonal Floorspace Schedule relating to 551sqm of C3 Residential Floorspace.
site_name: The Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area
